General.Name: SandRidge Energy Inc
General.Description: SandRidge Energy, Inc. engages in the acquisition, development, and production of oil, natural gas, and natural gas liquids in the United States Mid-Continent region. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.
General.Address: 1 East Sheridan Ave, Oklahoma City, OK, United States, 73104
